item.title: 分析师认为日本大选后日元和股市波动将加剧
item.description: 策略师表示，由于日本首相石破茂的执政联盟在上议院选举中受挫，使人们对日本的政策方向产生怀疑，从而削弱了日本资产的吸引力，日元兑美元汇率可能会出现波动。【原文：The yen may be volatile against the dollar as a setback for Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s ruling coalition in the upper house election casts doubt over the nation’s policy direction, dimming the appeal of Japanese assets, strategists say.】

item.title: 美联储官员对降息看法不一，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 周一开盘，黄金持稳，交易员们在权衡美国联邦储备委员会官员就唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税议程将如何影响通胀所发表的不同观点。【原文：Gold was steady as markets opened on Monday, with traders weighing differing views from US Federal Reserve officials on how President Donald Trump’s tariff agenda will impact inflation.】

item.title: 尽管存在风险，中国仍将斥资 1,670 亿美元建造西藏巨型水坝
item.description: 事实证明，在西藏修建一座 1.2 万亿元人民币（约合 1,670 亿美元）的巨型水坝所带来的巨大经济刺激和清洁电力推动力，对中国领导人具有足够的诱惑力，足以压倒对生物多样性和与印度关系的潜在破坏的担忧。【原文：The massive economic stimulus and boost to clean power from a 1.2 trillion yuan ($167 billion) mega-dam in Tibet has proven alluring enough to Chinese leaders to outweigh concerns about potential damage to biodiversity and relations with India.】

item.title: 贸易停战后中国稀土永磁体出货量猛增 158
item.description: 在全球供应紧张威胁到工厂倒闭并激化贸易紧张局势之后，中国在 6 月份增加了稀土磁铁的发货量，其中包括对美国的发货量。【原文：China boosted shipments of rare earth magnets in June — including to the US — after a global supply squeeze that threatened factory closures and inflamed trade tensions.】

item.title: 新加坡元面临美国关税和政策转变的压力
item.description: 由于美国的贸易挑战有可能恶化，以及对汇率政策放松的猜测升温，新加坡元再次面临压力。【原文：Singapore’s dollar is under renewed pressure as US trade challenges are primed to worsen and as speculation of exchange-rate policy easing rises.】

item.title: 尽管美国关税存在不确定性，韩国的早期出口仍保持稳健
item.description: 韩国的早期出口在 7 月份保持了增长势头，反映出这个依赖贸易的经济体的韧性，因为首尔正努力在 8 月 1 日全面关税上调之前与华盛顿达成协议。【原文：South Korea’s early exports maintained momentum in July, reflecting the trade-dependent economy’s resilience as Seoul works to reach a deal with Washington before across-the-board tariffs rise on Aug. 1.】

item.title: 石油止跌回升，贸易谈判、俄罗斯能源限制成焦点
item.description: 在本月首次出现周度下跌后，石油价格变化不大，市场关注的焦点是贸易协议的进展和欧盟遏制俄罗斯能源出口的努力。【原文：Oil was little changed after its first weekly drop this month, with the focus on trade deal progress and the European Union’s efforts to curb Russian energy exports.】

item.title: 安永称英国以地缘政治为由发出盈利警告创历史新高
item.description: 咨询公司 EY Parthenon 的一份报告显示，在英国上市的公司中，在盈利警告中提及地缘政治的公司数量创下了历史新高。【原文：The number of UK-listed companies flagging geopolitics in their profit warnings has hit a record high, according to a report by consultancy firm EY Parthenon.】

item.title: CEBR 称，英国二手购物今年将达到 48 亿英镑
item.description: 研究显示，去年有三分之二的英国消费者在网上购买二手商品，随着购物者控制消费，以及所谓的 "二手 "商品越来越多，这一数字有望增长。【原文：Two-thirds of British consumers bought second-hand goods online last year, research shows, a figure expected to grow as shoppers rein in spending and as so-called “pre-loved” items become more available.】

item.title: 美联储将在全球降息浪潮中让特朗普继续等待
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）正在努力争取美联储降息，但世界各地的政策制定者并不需要这么多说服。【原文：Donald Trump is struggling to get the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates, but policymakers around the world won’t need so much convincing.】

item.title: 通货紧缩引发狂热，中国债券 ETF 规模突破 500 亿美元
item.description: 中国投资者正在抢购追踪债券的交易所交易基金，押注于其较低的成本和多样化的风险敞口，以从顽固的通货紧缩环境和对企业部门的政策支持中获利。【原文：Chinese investors are snapping up exchange-traded funds tracking bonds, betting on their lower costs and diversified exposure to profit from an environment of stubborn deflation and policy support for the corporate sector.】

item.title: 新西兰通胀率加速至 2.7%，低于预测值
item.description: 新西兰第二季度的通胀加速度低于经济学家的预测，尽管通胀率已升至储备银行1%-3%目标区间的顶端。【原文：New Zealand inflation accelerated less than economists forecast in the second quarter, even as it pushed toward the top of the Reserve Bank’s 1-3% target band.】

item.title: 日本政治不确定性令日元走高：市场综述
item.description: 日本执政联盟在周末的上议院选举中遭遇历史性失败，为政治不确定性埋下伏笔，日元因此走强。亚洲市场开局喜忧参半。【原文：The yen strengthened after Japan’s ruling coalition suffered a historic defeat in the weekend’s upper house election, setting the stage for political uncertainty. Asian markets are poised for a mixed start.】

item.title: 联盟将失去多数席位，日本股市期货保持稳定
item.description: 在日本执政联盟预计将在上议院选举中失去多数席位后，日本股票期货在早盘交易中变化不大。【原文：Japanese stock futures were little changed in early trading after the nation’s ruling coalition was projected to lose its majority in the upper house election.】

item.title: 英国承诺为丑闻缠身的水务部门提供消费者支持
item.description: 英国将成立一个新的办公室，负责调查消费者对自来水公司的投诉，这是对多年来投资不足和污染丑闻后陷入危机的自来水行业进行 "全面 "整顿的一部分。【原文：Britain will set up a new office to investigate consumer complaints against water companies as part of a “root and branch” overhaul of a sector in crisis after years of under-investment and pollution scandals.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的帝国在埃隆-马斯克的压力下摇摇欲坠
item.description:
特斯拉、SpaceX和xAI正努力应对马斯克与特朗普的不和以及疯狂下注所带来的影响。【原文：

Tesla, SpaceX and xAI are struggling to deal with the fallout from Musk’s Trump feud and wild bets.

】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 随着美国石油钻探的低迷，石油服务公司计划如何渡过经济放缓的难关？本周主要钻探公司公布财报时，这个问题的答案将成为人们关注的焦点。石油需求的下降还导致炼油厂停工，而美国清洁能源部署的时间也在流逝。乙醇已成为全球贸易战的焦点。【原文：With US oil drilling in the doldrums, how do oilservice companies plan to ride out the slowdown? The answer to that question will be top of mind when leading drillers report earnings this week. The decline in oil demand also has refineries shutting down while the clock ticks on clean energy deployments in the US. And ethanol has taken center stage in the global trade war.】

item.title: 日本自民党联盟预计将失去多数席位，日元走高
item.description: 由于交易商对日本执政联盟未能在上议院选举中赢得多数票作出反应，日元兑美元走强。【原文：The yen strengthened against the dollar as traders reacted to Japan’s ruling coalition failing to win a majority in the upper house election.】

item.title: 巴西总检察长要求对美国关税可能引发的内幕交易进行调查
item.description: 在美国宣布对巴西商品征收关税前后，巴西总检察长正寻求对该国货币市场可能存在的内幕交易进行调查。【原文：Brazil’s attorney general is seeking a probe into possible insider trading in the country’s currency markets around the announcement of US tariffs on Brazilian goods.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油公司称欧盟对印度纳亚拉公司的制裁 "不合理
item.description: 共同拥有印度纳亚拉能源炼油厂的俄罗斯石油巨头俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）称，欧洲对该炼油厂实施的新制裁是 "不合理和非法的"。【原文：Newly imposed European sanctions against India’s Nayara Energy refinery are “unjustified and illegal,” according to Russian oil major Rosneft PJSC that co-owns the facility.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁让华尔街寻找完美的鲍威尔对冲工具
item.description: 周三上午，当全球市场因唐纳德-特朗普总统可能解雇杰罗姆-鲍威尔的消息而颤抖时，Citrini Research 公司的詹姆斯-范盖伦（James van Geelen）毫不迟疑地向他的约 5 万名客户发出了 "宏观交易 "警报。【原文：On Wednesday morning, as markets worldwide shuddered on news that President Donald Trump was likely to fire Jerome Powell, James van Geelen at Citrini Research wasted no time in blasting a “macro trade” alert to his some 50,000 clients.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所集团考虑 24 小时交易，英国《金融时报》报道
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，伦敦证券交易所集团正在考虑是否推出 24 小时交易，以满足小投资者日益增长的需求。【原文：London Stock Exchange Group is weighing whether to introduce 24-hour trading in response to growing demand from small investors, the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: 司法部调查 Libor 过渡期间 CLO 市场的合谋行为
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国司法部正在对抵押贷款债务的一些投资者是否串通一气，在 2023 年初市场从丑闻缠身的伦敦银行间同业拆借利率过渡时加强头寸进行反垄断刑事调查。【原文：The US Justice Department is conducting a criminal antitrust investigation into whether some investors in collateralized loan obligations colluded to bolster their positions as markets transitioned away from the scandal-plagued London interbank offer rate in early 2023, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者对收益的渴求推动 S&P 500 红利期权增长
item.description: 美国投资者对收益率的需求正在助推 S&P 500 指数股息期货和期权市场的增长；这是美国长期落后于欧洲的衍生品领域的一个小众角落。【原文：Investor demand for yield in the US is helping fuel growth in the market for S&P 500 Index dividend futures and options — a niche corner of the derivatives world where America has long trailed Europe.】

item.title: 完美定价"：关税阴影笼罩高估值股票
item.description: 华尔街的传统观点似乎认为，美国股市最近不断创下新高，是因为在关税威胁方面，唐纳德-特朗普总统说话声音很大，但拿的是小棍子。【原文：The conventional wisdom on Wall Street appears to be that the US stock market’s latest march to records has been unabated because, when it comes to tariff threats, President Donald Trump talks loudly but carries a small stick.】

item.title: 美元反思促使新兴国家出售更多欧元债务
item.description: 新兴市场借贷者正在以十多年来最快的速度开发欧元债券市场，以利用日益增长的脱离美元的多样化需求。【原文：Emerging-market borrowers are tapping the euro bond market at the fastest pace in over a decade, capitalizing on the rising demand for diversification away from the US dollar.】

item.title: 新兴市场动态：欧元债券销售激增（播客）
item.description: Vinicius Andrade 和宋子嘉讨论了新兴市场借款人出售欧元计价债券的趋势，因为投资者希望从美国分散投资的需求日益高涨。【原文：Vinicius Andrade and Zijia Song discuss the trend of selling euro-denominated bonds for emerging-market borrowers amid rising investor demand to diversify away from the US.】

item.title: 中国和越南计划在美国加征关税之际举行首次联合陆军演习
item.description: 中国和越南计划于本月举行首次联合陆军训练演习，这是两国在努力应对美国关税政策的同时加深军事关系的一个迹象。【原文：China and Vietnam plan to hold their first joint army training exercise this month, a sign of deepening military ties as the two countries grapple with US tariff policies.】

item.title: 首款可折叠 iPhone 将于明年面世，其风格与苹果大相径庭
item.description: 当首款可折叠 iPhone 于明年亮相时，这将是史上最不像苹果的发布会。还有M5 iPad Pro 的性能将得到显著提升；Meta 又抢到了两名苹果人工智能研究人员；谷歌确定了 Pixel 10 的发布日期。【原文：When the first foldable iPhone debuts next year, it will be the least Apple-like launch ever. Also: The M5 iPad Pro is set to get a notable improvement; Meta snags two more Apple AI researchers; and Google sets the date for its Pixel 10 launch.】

item.title: Metrics Credit 称对监管机构 ASIC 的调查一无所知
item.description: Metrics Credit Partners Pty 表示，在彭博新闻社上周报道澳大利亚证券与投资委员会正在对该公司进行调查之后，它并不知道该委员会对该公司进行了任何调查。【原文：Metrics Credit Partners Pty said it’s unaware of any investigation by the Australian Securities & Investments Commission into the company after Bloomberg News reported last week that the regulator was probing it.】
